ygData.subject: Reading archive with C#
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to read a compressed archive with C# and not having any luck. I tried to use the GZipStream, but it stops after reading in the first 10 lines

Hi,

I am trying to read a compressed archive with C# and not having any lu=
ck.

I tried to use the GZipStream, but it stops after reading in the first=
 10 lines of the header for the archive. It uncompressed that part successf=
ully but reports an end of stream once it's done the header.

It seems that=
 Heritrix is writing archive files by appending gzip chunks to the end of t=
he archive. This is causing me problems because GZipStream stops after read=
ing the first chunk.

Does anyone have any idea on how I can get this to wo=
rk?

Thanks,
